content: Should I be added to the list of wg-governance team members? (https://github.com/rust-lang/team/blob/master/teams/wg-governance.toml) No one seems to object to my participation in meetings, but AFAIK this wg doesn't really have a clear-cut concept of membership.

Should I be added to the list of wg-governance team members?

It seems like a mistake that you aren't. I've filed rust-lang/team#282 to fix that.
